sections.general: independent beauty advisor career overview to gain an entry-level position in the customer service industry with room for growth and advancement that will lead to a lasting relationship. core strengths customer service expert top sales performer energetic work attitude telecommunication skills courteous demeanor adaptive team player sharp problem solver strong organizational skills
